PREFIX dcat: <http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#>
PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
PREFIX dgov: <http://data.gov.be#>

DELETE 
	{	?dataset dcterms:spatial ?o }
INSERT 
	{ 	?dataset dcterms:coverage "Brussels Hoofdstedelijk Gewest"@nl .
	 	?dataset dcterms:coverage "Région de Bruxelles-Capitale"@fr .
		?dataset dcterms:spatial <http://sws.geonames.org/2800867/> .
		?dataset dgov:spatial <http://data.gov.be/en/taxonomy/term/48> }
WHERE
	{	?dataset dcterms:spatial ?o }
